nodes.bodyText: best to leave an empty line to match the style guide - probably with a comment that it's explicitly ignored,
Since the code is ported from C, disabling the warning on the class may be the way to go.

Since the code is ported from C, disabling the warning on the class may be the way to go.

@Arthur-Milchior - I actually like this solution, just suppress the warning on the class for ported code, it's more useful with ports to maintain upstream style for port-comparison over time vs picking lint IMHO
Fine by me. i didn't know there was a reason for not respecting usual style
Done on the method, since the problem is at the method level.
